meanings.definition: Mohrs: a unit of measurement for electrical resistance
meanings.sent1: The circuit needed more mohrs to function properly.
meanings.sent2: The technician measured the resistance in mohrs.
meanings.sent3: I accidentally bought a bag of mohrs instead of ohms!
meanings.sent4: Her determination was as strong as a thousand mohrs.
meanings.sent5: The concept of mohrs can be tricky to understand at first.

meanings.definition: Mohrs: a surname of German origin
meanings.sent1: Mr. Mohrs is a well-known name in our town.
meanings.sent2: The Mohrs family has a long history in Germany.
meanings.sent3: Why did the Mohrs family name their dog 'Sparky'?
meanings.sent4: The Mohrs surname stood out like a beacon in the crowd.
meanings.sent5: The Mohrs family reunion was a joyous occasion.

meanings.definition: Mohrs: a plural form of the word 'Mohr', referring to a dark-skinned person in historical contexts
meanings.sent1: The painting depicted several Mohrs in the background.
meanings.sent2: Historians studied the lives of the Mohrs in that era.
meanings.sent3: The Mohrs at the market always had the best spices.
meanings.sent4: In the story, the Mohrs symbolized resilience and strength.
meanings.sent5: The Mohrs' presence added depth to the historical narrative.
